title: 36d00 - Summary.
text:
The OSHA standard at 29 CFR 1928.110 requires that
covered employees engaged in hand-labor operations be provided at no cost and
with reasonable use of with drinking water, toilet facilities and hand-washing
facilities by their agricultural employer.  29 CFR 1928.110
html:
The OSHA standard at 29 CFR 1928.110 requires that covered employees engaged in hand-labor operations be provided at no cost and with reasonable use of with drinking water, toilet facilities and hand-washing facilities by their agricultural employer.

 

29 CFR 1928.110
